response.explain: The previous action code has successfully grasped the pork chop from the fridge. The next step is to move the robot to the oven.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Grasp the pork chop from the fridge.
(3) Move the robot to the oven.
(4) Open the oven.
(5) Put the pork chop inside the oven.
(6) Toggle on the oven to heat the pork chop.
(7) After heating, grasp the pork chop from the oven.
(8) Move the robot to the countertop where the plates are.
(9) Grasp a plate from the countertop.
(10) Put the heated pork chop on the plate.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Move the robot to the oven
    oven = registry(env, "oven_wuinhm_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, oven, camera)
    donothing(env)
